HomePage.title: Faster Feedback on <power>Web</power>
HomePage.slogan: Enhance your workflow and iterate faster by starting and resolving discussions that are right in front of you.

section1.title: Your <power>team</power> never wastes time.
section1.content: All discussions happens where they belong, directly on the site. Kudo allows your team to comment directly on web elements for any website, without any setup, configuration or code.

section3.title: Privacy is <power>non-negotiable</power>.
section3.content: Kudo is open-source; our software implementation is accessible to everyone and you can always switch to self-hosted.

section4.title: Skip the Jargon.
section4.content: No code, complicated setups or tools to learn.

pricing.title: Privacy is non-negotiable.
pricing.content: We do not store the content of your webpages, instead we generate fingerprints to track which comments placed on which elements on which web document. Kudo is also an open-source under MIT license project, For now, we do not charge for server hosting, but will be changed soon only for teams that exceeds 3 members.

Contact.subheader: We'd love to hear from you!
Contact.description: Whether you have a question, feedback, or just want to chat, don't hesitate to reach out. We're here to help and are excited to connect with you. Please fill out the form, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
Contact.action: You can also contact us directly at
